root.title: treasuri balanc fed rise march 12
root.body: treasuri balanc feder reserv rise march 12 3.038 billion dlr march 12 2.715 billion dlr previou busi dai treasuri sai latest budget statement balanc tax loan note account fall 7.623 billion dlr 8.870 billion dlr respect dai treasuri oper cash balanc total 10.661 billion dlr march 12 compar 11.586 billion dlr march 11
